channel.title: Arm shows that (New control connection opened from 127.0.0.1)
channel.description: So i am in Arm "Bandwidth page" and Events section is full of notices, that new control connection opened. I mean all page is full of these notices. It shows that new control connection opened in every few seconds. Why that happens ? Why new control connection is opened in every few seconds ? Someone attacking me ?

item.title: Arm shows that (New control connection opened from 127.0.0.1)
item.dc:creator: PeterK
item.description:
So i am in Arm “Bandwidth page” and Events section is full of notices, that new control connection opened.
I mean all page is full of these notices. It shows that new control connection opened in every few seconds.
Why that happens ? Why new control connection is opened in every few seconds ? Someone attacking me ?

Read full topic
item.source: Arm shows that (New control connection opened from 127.0.0.1)
